title: Mediterranean Courgette Fritters and Salsa

ingredients.content: 30 g spring onions, cut in pieces (3 cm)
550 g courgettes, cut in pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place parsley in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add spring onions and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add cherry tomatoes, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper and sugar then mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Tip out into a bowl and set aside.
Place courgettes, onions and garlic in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add flour, eggs, salt and pepper and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then add feta and gently mix in with spatula.

Heat oil in large, non-stick frying pan over a medium/high heat. Once hot, add a heaped tablespoon of courgette batter and cook 3-4 minutes on each side until cooked through and golden. Serve warm or cold with the salsa.

hintsAndTricks: Serve the fritters and salsa accompanied by a mixed leaf or rocket salad.
